entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he' and 'Harry'. The text describes Harry's actions and emotions throughout the scene.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A person who is trying to hold back Harry. Lupin is described as grabbing Harry around the chest and holding him back.

relationships.description: Lupin is holding back Harry, preventing him from reaching something or someone. This relationship is described in the text as Lupin grabbing Harry around the chest and holding him back.
